text: Yesli by ty (o Mukhammad!) doverilsya im, khotya by nemnogo, togda by po Nashemu poveleniyu ty vkusil by vdvoyne Nashego nakazaniya v etoy zhizni i v posledney zhizni i ne nashol by sebe zastupnika, kotoryy mog by izbavit' tebya ot muchitel'nogo nakazaniya. No etogo ne mozhet sluchit'sya s toboy, ibo ty - Nash vernyy poslannik
